verses.roman:
lakṣmī-ādi kari' kṛṣṇa-preme lubdha hañā
nāma-prema āsvādilā manuṣye janmiyā

synonyms: lakṣmī-ādi—the goddess of fortune and others; kari'-in this way; kṛṣṇa-preme—for love of Kṛṣṇa; lubdha hañā—being greedy; nāma-prema—the holy name of Kṛṣṇa in love; āsvādilā—tasted; manuṣye janmiyā—taking birth in human society.
translation: The goddess of fortune and others, allured by love of Kṛṣṇa, also came down in the form of human beings and tasted the holy name of the Lord in love.
